name: duunoii-video-platform
description: Video platform similar to YouTube/Netflix built with NestJS and Next.js

scripts.db:restart: npm run db:stop && npm run db:start
scripts.clean: npm run kill-ports && npm run db:restart
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:web
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:web
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:api && npm run lint:fix:web
scripts.format: npm run format:api && npm run format:web
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:api && npm run format:check:web
scripts.format:check:api: cd api && npm run format:check || true
scripts.format:check:web: cd web && npm run format:check || true
